DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see whether ASP-1001 give nasal spray safe reduce sign symptom allergic rhinitis ( hayfever ) follow nasal challenge antigen .
DOC.brief_title: Topical ASP-1001 ( Contrast Media Formulation ) Acute Response Nasal Allergen Challenge ( NAC )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males females 18 55 year age . 2 . History grass and/or ragweed allergic rhinitis . 3 . Positive skin test grass and/or ragweed antigen . 4 . Positive response screen nasal challenge . 1 . Physical sign symptom suggestive renal , hepatic cardiovascular disease . 2 . Pregnant lactating woman . 3 . Upper respiratory infection sinusitis within 14 day study start . 4 . Use nasal steroid , antihistamine last 2 week . 5 . FEV1 < 80 % predict screening subject history mild asthma 6. current smoker recent exsmokers 7 . Any social medical condition , opinion investigator , would preclude provision inform consent , make participation study unsafe , complicate interpretation study outcome data , otherwise interfere achieve study objective .
